Content:: The Ministry of Health is the Moroccan Ministry in charge of implementing government policies related to citizens' health. It was established on 1955 during the establishment of the first Moroccan government after independence.[1] Like other Moroccan ministries, the Ministry of Health consists of a central administration located in the capital Rabat and regional administrations distributed all over the national territory.[2]  This Morocco-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This government-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
